Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a single course offered on the platform.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the course.

level.description: The difficulty level of the course (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate).

compareAtPrice.description: The original price for comparison, if on sale.

description.description: A short description of the course.

image.description: The ID for the placeholder image.

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill development program offered on the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skill program.

title.description: The title of the skill program.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the skill.

progress.description: A simulated progress percentage for display purposes.

description.description: A short description of the skill program.

image.description: The ID for the placeholder image.
